actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to clarify the jurisdiction of certain Federal courts with respect to busing and to confer such jurisdiction upon certain other courts.

summary.text: Transfers from Federal to State courts, jurisdiction over cases in which the remedy of assignment of children to public schools on the basis of race or creed, and requiring the transportation of such children, is either sought or may be granted. Vests appellate jurisdiction of such cases in the Supreme Court of the United States by writ of certiorari from the highest State or territorial court exercising such jurisdiction.

titles.title: A bill to clarify the jurisdiction of certain Federal courts with respect to busing and to confer such jurisdiction upon certain other courts.
